About Roberto Ferrero received his BSc, MSc and PhD degrees in Electrical Engineering from Politecnico di Milano, Italy, in 2008, 2009 and 2013, respectively. He joined the Department of Electrical Engineering & Electronics at the University of Liverpool as a Lecturer in 2015, and he has been a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) in the same Department since 2019. Before joining the University of Liverpool, he worked as a post-doctoral research assistant at the University of Pisa, Italy, and Politecnico di Milano, Italy. He is a Senior Member of the IEEE Instrumentation and Measurement Society, and an Associate Editor of the IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and Measurement.
